00001 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00002 /*
00003  *      Demo program of modbus example library
00004  *
00005  *      History:
00006  *      Date            Author                  Comment
00007  *      08-17-2005      AceLan Kao.             Create it.

00010 
00011 #define DEBUG
00012 
00013 #include <pthread.h>
00014 #include <stdarg.h>
00015 
00016 #include "mbserial.h"
00017 #include "mbtcp.h"
00018 #include "debug.h"
00019 
00020 #define         MAX_BUFFER_SIZE         256
00021 #define         SLAVE_TCP_ADDRESS       "192.168.127.100"
00022 #define         TCP_PORT                502
00023 
00024 #define         MASTER_PORT             PORT1
00025 #define         SLAVE_PORT              PORT2
00026 
00027 typedef struct
00028 {
00029         int socketfd;
00030         int port;
00031         char *adu;
00032         int adu_len;
00033 } Gateway;
00034 
00035 void *serial_master_child( void *ptr)
00036 {
00037         Gateway *arg= (Gateway *)ptr;
00038         int port, socketfd;
00039 
00040         char adu[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE], pdu[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00041         int adu_len, pdu_len;
00042         pMBAPStruct mbap= (pMBAPStruct)malloc(sizeof(MBAPStruct));
00043         char address;
00044         int times= 10;
00045 
00046         socketfd= arg->socketfd;
00047         port= arg->port;
00048         free( arg);
00049 
00050         adu_len= MBSerialBlockRead( port, adu, MAX_BUFFER_SIZE);
00051         if( adu_len == 0)               // it should not be happened
00052                 goto master_exit;
00053         if( adu_len < 0)
00054         {
00055                 printf("some error happened : %d\n", adu_len);
00056                 goto master_exit;
00057         }
00058         DbgShowf("Serial sending data to TCP, len = %d\n", adu_len);
00059         address= MBSerialGetAddress( adu);
00060         pdu_len= MBSerialGetPDU( pdu, adu, adu_len);
00061 
00062 #ifdef DEBUG
00063         printf(", pdu = ");
00064         print_s( pdu, pdu_len);
00065         printf("\n");
00066 #endif
00067 
00068         MBTCPMakeMBAP( mbap, 0, pdu_len+ 1, address);
00069         // TCP may timeout here...
00070         adu_len= MBTCPSendAndWaitResponse( socketfd, adu, pdu, pdu_len, mbap);
00071         if( adu_len < 0)
00072         {
00073                 printf("TCP slave is not connected, trying to connecting...\n");
00074                 MBTCPClientInit( &socketfd);
00075                 times= 10;
00076                 while( times > 0)
00077                 {
00078                         if( MBTCPClientConnect( socketfd, SLAVE_TCP_ADDRESS, TCP_PORT) == 0)
00079                                 break;
00080                         times--;
00081                         sleep( 1);
00082                 }
00083                 if( times == 0)
00084                         goto master_exit;
00085                 printf("TCP slave connected..\n");
00086                 adu_len= MBTCPSendAndWaitResponse( socketfd, adu, pdu, pdu_len, mbap);
00087         }
00088 
00089 #ifdef DEBUG
00090         printf("response from TCP : %d - ", adu_len);
00091         print_s( adu, adu_len);
00092         printf("\n");
00093 #endif
00094 
00095         MBTCPGetMBAP( adu, mbap);
00096         pdu_len= MBTCPGetPDU( pdu, adu, adu_len);
00097 
00098         MBSerialWrite( port, pdu, pdu_len, mbap->UnitIdentifier);
00099 
00100 master_exit:
00101         free( mbap);
00102         pthread_exit( NULL);
00103 }
00104 
00105 void *serial_master( void *ptr)
00106 {
00107         int socketfd, serialfd;
00108         char adu[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE], pdu[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00109         int adu_len, pdu_len;
00110         pMBAPStruct mbap= (pMBAPStruct)malloc(sizeof(MBAPStruct));
00111         char address;
00112         Gateway* gw;
00113         pthread_t threads;
00114 
00115         printf("try to open serial port%d\n", MASTER_PORT+ 1);
00116         if( MBSerialOpen( MASTER_PORT, MB_RTU_PROTOCOL) < 0)
00117         {
00118                 perror("serial");
00119                 exit( -1);
00120         }
00121         SerialSetSpeed( MASTER_PORT, 9600);
00122         printf("opened..\n");
00123 
00124         MBTCPClientInit( &socketfd);
00125         while( 1)
00126         {
00127                 printf("Master: trying to connect to slave..\n");
00128                 if( MBTCPClientConnect( socketfd, SLAVE_TCP_ADDRESS, TCP_PORT) < 0)
00129                 {
00130                         perror("TCP client");
00131                         continue;
00132                 }
00133                 else
00134                 {
00135                         printf("Master: connected..\n");
00136                         break;
00137                 }
00138         }
00139 
00140         printf("Master: serial fd = %d , socket fd = %d\n", FindFD( MASTER_PORT), socketfd);
00141         while( 1)
00142         {
00143                 if( SerialDataInInputQueue( MASTER_PORT) > 1)
00144                 {
00145                         gw= (Gateway *)malloc( sizeof( Gateway));
00146                         gw->socketfd= socketfd;
00147                         gw->port= MASTER_PORT;
00148 
00149                         pthread_create( &threads, NULL, serial_master_child, (void *)gw);
00150                 }
00151                 usleep( 1000);
00152         }
00153 
00154         free( mbap);
00155         pthread_exit( NULL);
00156 }
00157 
00158 void *serial_slave_child( void *ptr)
00159 {
00160         Gateway *arg= (Gateway *)ptr;
00161         int port, socketfd;
00162         char adu[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE], pdu[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00163         char rsp_adu[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE], rsp_pdu[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00164         int adu_len, pdu_len, rsp_adu_len, rsp_pdu_len;
00165         pMBAPStruct mbap= (pMBAPStruct)malloc(sizeof(MBAPStruct));
00166         char address;
00167         int times= 10;
00168 
00169         socketfd= arg->socketfd;
00170         port= arg->port;
00171         adu_len= arg->adu_len;
00172         memcpy( adu, arg->adu, adu_len);
00173         free( arg->adu);
00174         free( arg);
00175 
00176         MBTCPGetMBAP( adu, mbap);
00177         pdu_len= MBTCPGetPDU( pdu, adu, adu_len);
00178 
00179         address= mbap->UnitIdentifier;
00180         DbgShowf("Sending data and waiting for response..\n");
00181         print_s( pdu, pdu_len);
00182         printf("\n");
00183 
00184         rsp_adu_len= MBSerialSendAndWaitResponse( port, rsp_adu, pdu, pdu_len, address);
00185         if( rsp_adu_len == 0)
00186         {
00187                 DbgShowf("RTU timeout..\n");
00188                 goto slave_exit;
00189         }
00190         DbgShowf("Got Serial response..\n");
00191 
00192         printf("%d - ", rsp_adu_len);
00193         print_s( rsp_adu, rsp_adu_len);
00194         printf("\n");
00195 
00196         if( MBSerialGetAddress( rsp_adu) != address)
00197         {
00198                 printf("response address doesn't match to the request address\n");
00199                 goto slave_exit;
00200         }
00201         rsp_pdu_len= MBSerialGetPDU( rsp_pdu, rsp_adu, rsp_adu_len);
00202 
00203         MBTCPMakeMBAP( mbap, mbap->TransactionIdentifier, rsp_pdu_len+ 1, address);
00204         MBTCPWrite( socketfd, rsp_pdu, rsp_pdu_len, mbap);
00205 
00206 slave_exit:
00207         free( mbap);
00208         pthread_exit( NULL);
00209 }
00210 
00211 void *serial_slave( void *ptr)
00212 {
00213         int serverfd, clientfd;
00214         int adu_len;
00215         char adu[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE], client_addr[ MAX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00216         pMBAPStruct mbap= (pMBAPStruct)malloc(sizeof(MBAPStruct));
00217         char address;
00218         Gateway* gw;
00219         pthread_t threads;
00220 
00221         printf("try to open serial port2\n");
00222         if( MBSerialOpen( SLAVE_PORT, MB_RTU_PROTOCOL) < 0)
00223         {
00224                 perror("serial");
00225                 exit( -1);
00226         }
00227         printf("opened..\n");
00228         SerialSetSpeed( SLAVE_PORT, 9600);
00229 
00230         if( MBTCPServerInit( TCP_PORT, &serverfd) < 0)
00231         {
00232                 perror("socket");
00233                 exit( -1);
00234         }
00235         while( 1)
00236         {
00237                 printf("Slave: waiting client connect..\n");
00238                 if( MBTCPServerWaitConnection( serverfd, &clientfd, client_addr) < 0)
00239                 {
00240                         perror("socket");
00241                         exit( -1);
00242                 }
00243                 printf("Slave: client %s connedted..\n", client_addr);
00244 
00245                 while( 1 )
00246                 {
00247                         adu_len= MBTCPBlockRead( clientfd, adu, MAX_BUFFER_SIZE);
00248                         // disconnect
00249                         if( adu_len == 0)
00250                         {
00251                                 DbgShowf("Slave: TCP Master disconnect\n");
00252                                 break;
00253                         }
00254 
00255 #ifdef DEBUG
00256                         DbgShowf("Slave: got data from TCP master (%d)\n", adu_len);
00257                         print_s( adu, adu_len);
00258                         printf("\n");
00259 #endif
00260 
00261                         gw= (Gateway *)malloc( sizeof( Gateway));
00262                         gw->socketfd= clientfd;
00263                         gw->port= SLAVE_PORT;
00264                         gw->adu_len= adu_len;
00265                         gw->adu=(char*)malloc( adu_len);
00266                         memcpy( gw->adu, adu, adu_len);
00267 
00268                         pthread_create( &threads, NULL, serial_slave_child, (void *)gw);
00269                 }
00270         }
00271 
00272         free( mbap);
00273         pthread_exit( NULL);
00274 }
00275 
00276 int main()
00277 {
00278         pthread_t threads[ 2];
00279         void* thread_result[ 2];
00280 
00281         MBSerialInit();
00282 
00283         pthread_create( &threads[ 0], NULL, serial_master, NULL);
00284         pthread_create( &threads[ 1], NULL, serial_slave, NULL);
00285 
00286         pthread_join( threads[ 0], &thread_result[ 0]);
00287         pthread_join( threads[ 1], &thread_result[ 1]);
00288         return 0;
00289 }
